title: Exploring UKB Data - Extra
text: package containing experimental add-functions ukbwranglr.

title: Exploring UKB Data - Extra
text: can install development version ukbwranglrextra github :

what: Create a unique participant ID by combining UKB data field IDs — create_unique_id
title: Create a unique participant ID by combining UKB data field IDs — create_unique_id
text: Creates unique participant ID concatenating values selection UKB data fields. error raised final ID column contains non-unique values.

title: Create a unique participant ID by combining UKB data field IDs — create_unique_id
code: create_unique_id(   ukb_main,   ukb_data_dict = ukbwranglr::get_ukb_data_dict(),   field_ids = c("31", "52", "34", "21000", "53", "96", "50"),   id_col = "..unique_id",   remove = TRUE,   .ignore_duplicate_ids = FALSE )

title: Create a unique participant ID by combining UKB data field IDs — create_unique_id
text: ukb_main data frame - UKB main dataset. ukb_data_dict UK Biobank data dictionary (available data online). field_ids character vector fields IDs used create new unique ID column. match values column 'Field' UK Biobank data dictionary. id_col Name new column created. remove TRUE, remove input columns output data frame. .ignore_duplicate_ids TRUE, allow duplicate ID values raise warning found. May helpful debugging. default FALSE.

title: Create a unique participant ID by combining UKB data field IDs — create_unique_id
text: data frame additional column named specified id_col.

title: Create a unique participant ID by combining UKB data field IDs — create_unique_id
text: default, following field IDs used: 31 (Sex), 52 (Month birth), 34 (Year birth), 21000 (Ethnic background), 53 (Date attending assessment centre), 96 (Time since interview start blood pressure screen(s) shown), 50 (Standing height).

what: Create a UKB data frame with a unique ID column — create_unique_id_df
title: Create a UKB data frame with a unique ID column — create_unique_id_df
text: convenience function returns data frame main UK Biobank dataset unique ID column, created concatenating values selection variables.

title: Create a UKB data frame with a unique ID column — create_unique_id_df
code: create_unique_id_df(   path,   delim = "\t",   ukb_data_dict = ukbwranglr::get_ukb_data_dict(),   ukb_codings = ukbwranglr::get_ukb_codings(),   descriptive_colnames = TRUE,   labelled = TRUE,   field_ids = c("31", "52", "34", "21000", "53", "96", "50"),   id_col = "..unique_id",   remove = TRUE,   .ignore_duplicate_ids = FALSE )

title: Create a UKB data frame with a unique ID column — create_unique_id_df
text: path path UK Biobank main dataset file. delim Delimiter UK Biobank main dataset file. Default \t ukb_data_dict UKB data dictionary (available online UK Biobank data  showcase. data frame columns type character. default, downloaded ukbwranglr_resources  github repo. ukb_codings UKB codings dictionary. data frame columns type character. default, downloaded ukbwranglr_resources  github repo. descriptive_colnames TRUE, rename columns longer descriptive names derived UK Biobank's data dictionary 'Field' column. labelled TRUE, apply variable value labels using labelled. field_ids character vector fields IDs used create new unique ID column. match values column 'Field' UK Biobank data dictionary. id_col Name new column created. remove TRUE, remove input columns output data frame. .ignore_duplicate_ids TRUE, allow duplicate ID values raise warning found. May helpful debugging. default FALSE.

title: Create a UKB data frame with a unique ID column — create_unique_id_df
text: data frame

text: Generate multiple models

title: Generate multiple models — map_models
code: map_models(   df,   dict,   model_str,   engine = logistic_reg() %>% set_engine("glm") )

title: Generate multiple models — map_models
text: df Data frame dict data frame columns 'variable' 'label' model_str model formula string, containing one variable .x. engine parsnip engine

title: Generate multiple models — map_models
text: data frame

what: Interactively create a UK Biobank dataset — runMakeDataset
title: Interactively create a UK Biobank dataset — runMakeDataset
text: Launches shiny app interactively create UK Biobank dataset

title: Interactively create a UK Biobank dataset — runMakeDataset
code: runMakeDataset(   ukb_data_dict = ukbwranglr::get_ukb_data_dict(),   ukb_codings = ukbwranglr::get_ukb_codings(),   options = list(launch.browser = TRUE),   ... )

title: Interactively create a UK Biobank dataset — runMakeDataset
text: ukb_data_dict UKB data dictionary (available online UK Biobank data  showcase. data frame columns type character. default, downloaded ukbwranglr_resources  github repo. ukb_codings UKB codings dictionary. data frame columns type character. default, downloaded ukbwranglr_resources  github repo. options Named options passed runApp call (can following: "port", "launch.browser", "host", "quiet", "display.mode" "test.mode"). can also specify width height parameters provide hint embedding environment ideal height/width app. ... Additional parameters passed shinyApp

title: Interactively create a UK Biobank dataset — runMakeDataset
